title: Roadside Assistance
metaTitle: Roadside Assistance Services in UAE | Homezy
metaDescription: 24/7 roadside assistance in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and across UAE. Towing, jump starts, lockout service, and fuel delivery. Fast response times.
keywords: roadside assistance, towing, tow truck, jump start, battery jump, lockout service, car lockout, fuel delivery, emergency roadside, UAE
description: Get help when you need it most with our 24/7 roadside assistance services. Whether you have a flat tire, dead battery, locked keys, or need a tow, our response team is ready to help. We provide fast, professional service to get you back on the road or safely to a repair facility.
whatToExpect: Call our hotline and describe your situation and location. We dispatch the nearest available technician with appropriate equipment. They'll arrive quickly, assess the situation, and provide the needed service - whether it's a jump start, tire change, lockout assistance, fuel delivery, or tow.

faqs.question: What services do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer towing, jump starts, flat tire changes, lockout service (keys locked in car), fuel delivery, and minor roadside repairs. Our operators handle most common breakdown situations.

faqs.question: How quickly can you arrive?
faqs.answer: In urban areas, we typically arrive within 30-45 minutes. Remote locations may take longer. Our dispatcher provides an ETA when you call.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 service?
faqs.answer: Yes, our roadside assistance is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, including holidays. Emergencies don't keep business hours, and neither do we.

faqs.question: How much does towing cost?
faqs.answer: Towing rates depend on distance and vehicle type. We provide pricing before dispatch so you know the cost upfront. Basic roadside services have fixed rates.

faqs.question: Can you tow my car to any workshop?
faqs.answer: Yes, we tow to your preferred workshop, dealership, or home. If you don't have a preference, we can recommend reputable repair facilities.

schema.name: Roadside Assistance
schema.description: 24/7 roadside assistance including towing, jump starts, and lockout service.
